title: PortalX
description: Academic management tool for SRM University students. Track attendance, view marks, manage courses, and access timetables. Not affiliated with SRM University.

title: Refoodify
description: AI-powered food waste management platform that transforms leftovers into valuable resources through smart analysis, gamification, and community engagement. Built during a hackathon by Team GitHappens.

title: Among the space
description: Interactive space passport generator that lets users create and download futuristic IDs with a cosmic theme. Built with React and Tailwind by Team GitHappens during a hackathon.
